_header: Man weeneth ever for to liven
_description: Admonition to prepare for Death — a quatrain translating ‘Vir vitam querit non sentit quod morietur / Morti sternetur sic homo falsus erit’ which preceds it in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
Man wenit euere for toliuenHe þinket nouth þat he sal
                    deyȝeÞoru det adoun he sal ben driuen& ben begiled in is
                    eyȝe
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 25.
